item.title: About
item.description: Welcome! My name is TRAVIS CHEN, an engineer of the software persuasion. Feel free to check out my projects on Github. See my LinkedIn to learn more about my experiences. Opinions expressed do not necessarily reflect those of my employer. Contact ¶ You can contact me via email using the username travis.chen at this domain. You can also contact me via LinkedIn. Attributions ¶ Built with Hugo using the Sam Theme by victoriadrake.
